text: hey guys it's angel today I wanted to
share with you my three ingredient green
tea ice cream recipe now I just made
this yesterday and it was so good that I
want you guys to try this at home
it's only three ingredients so it's
definitely super easy the first
ingredient for our ice cream base we're
going to be using half and half and
that's just half milk and half cream now
if you are lactose intolerant or you
just don't like dairy products that's
okay you can always use coconut milk as
a base as well I'm not talking about the
coconut milk that you get in a square
box I am talking about the coconut milk
that you usually find at your local
Asian grocery store that's for desserts
that comes in a can the second
ingredient that we'll need is organic
cane sugar because I don't know about
you but I like my ice cream sweet and
finally of course we'll need matcha
powder now those are just ingredients
that we'll need for our ice cream base
in addition to those I highly recommend
that you get the goodies and make your
ice cream ala mode and for my alamode
ice cream today I am going to be using
mini Mochis that I got at the store
which are so soft and so good I also got
some chocolate sprinkles and these are
made in Indonesia I've never done this
brand before and it was actually
debating on whether or not to get it
they're kind of a splurge seven or eight
dollars I think when I stuck on
chocolate sprinkles but worth every
penny seriously for those of you in
Indonesia thank you guys so much for
this product in addition to the
sprinkles I could not help myself and I
got some chocolate syrup because why did
I get this again oh because you only
live once
now seriously I just got this because
this is so good on ice cream so so good
don't forget this so now that we've seen
all the ingredients in my kitchen it's
time to make our ice cream for this
recipe I'm going to start with 1/2 a cup
of half-and-half keep that over low heat
and add in 3 tablespoons of cane sugar
and gradually assists in 1 tablespoon of
matcha powder now I recommend slowly
sifting then whisking in the matcha as
you go so everything's completely
dissolved once you're done pour the
liquid into a container and add another
half a cup of cold half-and-half so you
have 1 cup of ice cream mixture in total
and if you're wondering I'm adding in
the cold half-and-half to help cool down
the mixture before putting it in the
refrigerator to chill completely after a
few hours or overnight
take out your mixture give it one last
shaker stir in case anything settled and
then add it to your ice cream maker
today I'm using an ice cream pan which
is super fun to use and if you're
interested I'll leave a link to that in
the video description now you can eat
your ice cream right away
or sometimes I like to make it in
advance and store it in the freezer when
you're ready to serve take out a few
generous scoops of ice cream drizzle
with some chocolate syrup some mini
mochi bits and finally some chocolate
sprinkles for an ala mode ice cream
so that's my cream beating green tea ice
cream recipe as you can see it was super
easy to make so I highly recommend that
you guys try this at home
and of course it's definitely better
than the store-bought thank you guys so
much for watching give me a thumbs up if
you like this video thumbs up right here
and of course if you guys want to see
more ice cream recipes post in the
comments below and let me know what
flavors you want to see until then take
care
and then we'll see you guys soon bye
you
